INCOMPLETE.DESCRIPTION: Please enter your username or email address!

SUCCESS_RESET.TITLE: Password Reset
SUCCESS_RESET.DESCRIPTION: Your password has been successfully reset. You will receive an email within the next few minutes with a link to save your new password.

ERROR_RESET.TITLE: Error
ERROR_RESET.DESCRIPTION: An error occurred during reset. Please contact the administrator.

USER_NOT_FOUND.TITLE: User not found
USER_NOT_FOUND.DESCRIPTION: No user was found with this email address. Please check your input or register.

HOME.CHOOSE_PREFERENCE: Please select your preferences to receive personalized suggestions

REGISTER.LOGIN_INSTEAD: Already have an account? Sign in

EMAIL_VERIFICATION.TITLE: Registration successful
EMAIL_VERIFICATION.DESCRIPTION: We have sent a confirmation email to your email address. Please check your inbox and click on the confirmation link to complete your registration.

ERROR.EMAIL: Please enter a valid email address
ERROR.EMAIL_ALREADY_EXISTS: This email address is already registered
ERROR.PASSWORD: Password must contain at least 6 characters
ERROR.PASSWORD_TOO_SHORT: Password must be at least 6 characters long

INCOMPLETE.TITLE: Error
INCOMPLETE.DESCRIPTION: Please check your information! It seems to be incomplete.

INVALID.TITLE: Registration not possible
INVALID.DESCRIPTION: An error occurred during registration. Please try again later.

EMAIL_EXISTS.TITLE: Email already registered
EMAIL_EXISTS.DESCRIPTION: This email address is already registered. Please use a different email address or sign in.

USERNAME_EXISTS.TITLE: Username already taken
USERNAME_EXISTS.DESCRIPTION: This username is already taken. Please choose a different username.

PASSWORD_TOO_SHORT.TITLE: Password too short
PASSWORD_TOO_SHORT.DESCRIPTION: Password must be at least 6 characters long. Please choose a longer password.

SUCCESS.TITLE: Registration successful
SUCCESS.DESCRIPTION: Your account has been successfully created. You will be redirected...

EMAIL_VERIFICATION.TITLE: Email verification required
EMAIL_VERIFICATION.DESCRIPTION: We have sent you an email. Please verify your email address and then sign in.
